entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Cartwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:49 AM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -7.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cartwright Airport 06:37 AM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -7.9°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -9.9°C
Wind: NNE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:46 AM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 06:46 AM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 80 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 06:46 AM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023
